Class Label

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      GUIComponent
          Label

public class Label
extends GUIComponent

A label with a transparent background for writing text.

Version:
1.1 12/25/2010
Author:
Ed Parrish

Constructor Detail

Label

public Label(greenfoot.GreenfootImage img)
Constructs a label with the specified background image. The image may be written upon by calling setText().

Parameters:
img - The background image to display.

Label

public Label(java.lang.String text)
Constructs a label with the specified text displayed in the default text color and font on a transparent background without a border.

Parameters:
text - The text to display on the label

Label

public Label(java.lang.String text,
             java.awt.Color textColor)
Constructs a label with text of the specified color using the default font on a transparent background without a border.

Parameters:
text - The text to display on the label
textColor - The color to use for displaying text.

Label

public Label(java.lang.String text,
             java.awt.Font font)
Constructs a label with the specified text and font using the default text color on a transparent background without a border.

Parameters:
text - The text to display on the label
font - The font with which to write the text.

Label

public Label(java.lang.String text,
             java.awt.Font font,
             java.awt.Color textColor)
Constructs a label with text of the specified color and font on a transparent background without a border.

Parameters:
text - The text to display on the label
font - The font with which to display the text.
textColor - The color to use for displaying text.

Label

public Label(java.lang.String text,
             java.awt.Font font,
             java.awt.Color textColor,
             java.awt.Color bgColor)
Constructs a label with text of the specified color on a background of the specified color with a border.

Parameters:
text - The text to display on the label
font - The font with which to display the text.
textColor - The color to use for displaying text.
bgColor - The desired background color.
